{{Wip}}
[[Loot table]]s are  random generators to determine the [[item]]s you get when breaking a [[block]], opening a [[chest]], killing a [[mob]] and [[fishing]]. You can also get them using the {{cmd|/loot}} command.

== Chests ==
=== Villages ===
ex: {{cmd|/loot give @p loot "chests/village/<loot_table>"}}
